Suspected Violation State.answer: the state of the environment where the violation is believed to have occurred

Violation Description.info: Include a detailed description of the violation. For example, gas drilling, drum dumping etc. If necessary, include specific directions.
Violation Description.answer: There is a construction site located at 123 Main Street in Downtown New York that is illegally dumping construction waste into the nearby river. The violation occurs during the late evening hours, usually between 9 PM and 12 AM. To report the violation, take the following steps: 1. From my office at 456 Wall Street, head south on Broadway. 2. Turn left onto Park Place and continue for two blocks. 3. Turn right onto Church Street and walk for three blocks. 4. Take a left onto Murray Street and continue for one block. 5. The construction site will be on your right-hand side. It is a large building with scaffolding and construction equipment. Be sure to document any evidence, such as photographs or videos, and report the violation to the appropriate authorities.

Reporter Contact Information.info: You are not required to provide your contact information but the EPA might want to reach out to you for additional information.
